required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of SCTV01C in Healthy Population Aged ≥18 Years Previously Unvaccinated
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Phase Ⅰ/Ⅱ Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of SCTV01C in Healthy Population Aged ≥18 Years Previously Unvaccinated Against COVID-19

brief_summary.textblock: SCTV01C-02-1 is a randomized, double-blind, placebo controlled Phase Ⅰ/Ⅱ clinical trial of the SARS-CoV-2 recombinant bivalent trimeric S protein vaccine manufactured by Sinocelltech, Ltd. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety , tolerability and immunogenicity of the experimental vaccine in healthy adults aged ≥ 18 Years previously unvaccinated.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a randomized, double-blind, multi-center, placebo-controlled phase Ⅰ/Ⅱ clinical trial in adults aged ≥ 18 years previously unvaccinated. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety , tolerability and immunogenicity of the experimental SARS-CoV-2 protein vaccine (SCTV01C). The experimental vaccine and adjuvant (one placebo) were both manufactured by Sinocelltech, Ltd., while the saline (the other placebo) was commercially purchased. A total of 752 participants will be enrolled, with 112 at phase Ⅰ, and 640 at phase Ⅱ. There will be two dosage levels (20μg and 40μg), and two age gruops (18~59 years old and ≥ 60 years old ) at both Phase Ⅰ and Phase Ⅱ. All of participants will be assigned to receive two doses of experimental vaccine(20μg or 40μg) or placebo (Adjuvant or Saline) on the schedule of Day 0 and Day 28.

primary_outcome.measure: Phase I: Incidence and severity of adverse reactions (ARs) from Day 0 to Day 7 days after each dose of vaccination.
primary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 0 to Day 7 after each dose
primary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of adverse reactions occured from Day 0 to Day 7 after each dose of vaccination.

primary_outcome.measure: Phase II: Geometric mean titers (GMT) and seroconversion rate of total IgG antibody (ELISA method) against the SARS-CoV-2 Alpha, Beta and Delta variants on Day 14 after the second dose of vaccination;
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 after the second dose of vaccination
primary_outcome.description: IgG GMT and seroconversion rate against the SARS-CoV-2 Alpha, Beta, Delta variants on Day 14 after the second dose of vaccination.

primary_outcome.measure: Phase II: GMT and seroconversion rate of neutralizing antibody (Live-virus neutralization assay) against the Alpha and Beta variants of SARS-CoV-2 on Day 14 after the second dose of vaccination;
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 after the second dose of vaccination
primary_outcome.description: GMT and seroconversion rate of neutralizing antibody (Live-virus neutralization assay) against Alpha and Beta variants of SARS-CoV-2 on Day 14 after the second dose of vaccination;

primary_outcome.measure: Phase II: GMT and seroconversion rate of neutralizing antibody (Pseudovirus neutralization assay) against the SARS-CoV-2 Alpha and Beta variants on Day 14 after the second dose of vaccination;
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 after the second dose of vaccination
primary_outcome.description: GMT and seroconversion rate of neutralizing antibody (Pseudovirus neutralization assay) against the SARS-CoV-2 Alpha and Beta variants on Day 14 after the second dose of vaccination;

primary_outcome.measure: Phase II: Incidence and severity of solicited AEs from Day 0 to Day 7 after each dose of vaccination;
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 to Day 7 after each dose of vaccination
primary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of solicited AEs from Day 0 to Day 7 after each dose of vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase I: GMT and seroconversion rate of total IgG antibody (ELISA method) against the Alpha, Beta, Delta variants SARS-CoV-2 and T4-Foldon on Day 28 after the first dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 28 after the first dose of vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: GMT and seroconversion rate of total IgG antibody against the Alpha, Beta, Delta variants of SARS-CoV-2 and T4-Foldon on Day 28 after the first dose of vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase I: GMT and seroconversion rate of total IgG antibody (ELISA method) against the Alpha, Beta, Delta variants of SARS-CoV-2 and T4-Foldon on Day 14, Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14, Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.description: GMT and seroconversion rate of total IgG antibody against the Alpha, Beta, Delta variants of SARS-CoV-2 and T4-Foldon on Day 14, Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase I: GMT and seroconversion rate of neutralizing antibody (Pseudovirus neutralization assay) against the Alpha and Beta variants of SARS-CoV-2 on Day 14, Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14, Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: GMT and seroconversion rate of neutralizing antibody (Pseudovirus neutralization assay) against the SARS-CoV-2 Alpha and Beta variants of SARS-CoV-2on Day 14, Day28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination;

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase I: GMT and seroconversion rate of neutralizing antibody (Live-virus neutralization assay) against the Alpha and Beta variants of SARS-CoV-2 on Day 14, Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14, Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: GMT and seroconversion rate of neutralizing antibody (Live-virus neutralization assay) against the Alpha and Beta variants of SARS-CoV-2 on Day 14, Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination;

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase I: Number of IFN-γ positive (characterizing Th1) and IL-4 positive (characterizing Th2) T cell subpopulations 14 days and 90 days after the second dose of study vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 and Day 90 after the second dose of study vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Number of IFN-γ positive (characterizing Th1) and IL-4 positive (characterizing Th2) T cell subpopulations 14 days and 90 days after the second dose of study vaccination;

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase I: Incidence and severity of solicited adverse events (AEs) from Day 0 to Day 7 days after each dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 to Day 7 days after each dose of vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of solicited adverse events (AEs) from Day 0 to Day 7 days after each dose of vaccination.;

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase I: Incidence and severity of all unsolicited AEs Day 0 to Day 28 after each dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 to Day 28 after each dose of vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of all unsolicited AEs Day 0 to Day 28 after each dose of vaccination;

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase I: Incidence and severity of laboratory abnormalities related AEs on Day 3 after each dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 3 after each dose of vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of laboratory abnormalities related AEs on Day 3 after each dose of vaccination;

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase I: Incidence and severity of serious adverse events (SAEs), adverse events of special interest (AESIs) and medically attended adverse events (MAAEs) within 365 days after each dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 365 days after each dose of vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of serious adverse events (SAEs), adverse events of special interest (AESIs) and medically attended adverse events (MAAEs) within 365 days after each dose of vaccination;

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase II: Incidence and severity of all unsolicited AEs Day 0 to Day 28 after each dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 to Day 28 after each dose of vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of all unsolicited AEs Day 0 to Day 28 after each dose of vaccination;

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase II: Incidence and severity of SAEs, AESIs, MAAEs within 365 days after each dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 365 days after each dose of vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of SAEs, AESIs, MAAEs within 365 days after each dose of vaccination;

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase II: GMT and seroconversion rate of total IgG antibodies (ELISA method) against the Alpha, Beta and Delta variants of SARS-CoV-2 on Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: GMT and seroconversion rate of total IgG antibodies against the Alpha, Beta and Delta variants of SARS-CoV-2 on Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination;

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase II: GMT of the neutralizing antibody titer (pseudoviral neutralization assay) against the Alpha and Beta variants of SARS-CoV-2 on Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: GMT of the neutralizing antibody titer (pseudoviral neutralization assay) against the Alpha and Beta variants of SARS-CoV-2 on Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination;

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase II: GMT and seroconversion rate of neutralizing antibody (Live-virus neutralization assay) against the SARS-CoV-2 Alpha and Beta variants on Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: GMT and seroconversion rate of neutralizing antibody (Live-virus neutralization assay) against the SARS-CoV-2 Alpha and Beta variants on Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and Day 365 after the second dose of vaccination;

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase II: GMT of neutralizing antibody titers (pseudoviral neutralization assay) on Day 14, Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and D365 after the second vaccination for other variants, such as Delta, Lambda and Gamma, etc.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14, Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and D365 after the second vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Phase II: GMT of neutralizing antibody titers (pseudoviral neutralization assay) on Day 14, Day 28, Day 90, Day 180 and D365 after the second vaccination for other variants, such as Delta, Lambda and Gamma, etc.

arm_group.arm_group_label: 18~59 yrs. low dosage (20 μg) - SCTV01C VACCINE
arm_group.description: 20 participants in Phase I and 120 participants in Phase II at the age of 18~59 years old will receive two doses of low dosage (20 μg/0.5mL) SCTV01C VACCINE on Day 0 and Day 28
4 participants in Phase I and 20 participants in Phase II at the age of 18~59 years old will receive two doses of study adjuvant (SCT-VA02B ,0.5mL) on Day 0 and Day 28
4 participants in Phase I and 20 participants in Phase II at the age of 18~59 years old will receive two doses of saline (0.5mL) on Day 0 and Day 28

arm_group.description: 20 participants in Phase I and 120 participants in Phase II at the age of ≥60 years old will receive two doses of low dosage (20 μg/0.5mL) SCTV01C VACCINE on Day 0 and Day 28
4 participants in Phase I and 20 participants in Phase II at the age of ≥60 years old will receive two doses of study adjuvant (SCT-VA02B, 0.5mL) on Day 0 and Day 28
4 participants in Phase I and 20 participants in Phase II at the age of ≥60 years old will receive two doses of saline (0.5mL) on Day 0 and Day 28

arm_group.description: 20 participants in Phase I and 120 participants in Phase II at the age of 18~59 years old will receive two doses of high dosage (40 μg/0.5mL) SCTV01C VACCINE on Day 0 and Day 28
4 participants in Phase I and 20 participants in Phase II at the age of 18~59 years old will receive two doses of study adjuvant (SCT-VA02B, 0.5mL) on Day 0 and Day 28
4 participants in Phase I and 20 participants in Phase II at the age of 18~59 years old will receive two doses of saline (0.5mL) on Day 0 and Day 28

arm_group.arm_group_label: ≥60 yrs. high dosage (40 μg) - SCTV01C VACCINE
arm_group.description: 20 participants in Phase I and 120 participants in Phase II at the age of ≥60 years old will receive two doses of high dosage (40 μg/0.5mL) SCTV01C VACCINE on Day 0 and Day 28
4 participants in Phase I and 20 participants in Phase II at the age of ≥60 years old will receive two doses of study adjuvant (SCT-VA02B, 0.5mL) on Day 0 and Day 28
4 participants in Phase I and 20 participants in Phase II at the age of ≥60 years old will receive two doses of saline (0.5mL) on Day 0 and Day 28

intervention.description: A Recombinant Trimeric S Protein Vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 Alpha and Beta Variants
intervention.arm_group_label: 18~59 yrs. high dosage (40 μg) - SCTV01C VACCINE

intervention.description: SCT-VA02B is the adjuvant of SCTV01C VACCINE applied as one of the control in the trial
Saline is used as the other control in the trial

facility.name: Hunan Provincial Center for Disease Control And Prevention
